name: Atzral
description:
Atzral and his dog Hole live in the world of Nefarted. It was a day like any other, when Atzral came home and couldn't find Hole anymore, he was gone! The door was open and there was a strange smell of mechanic oil, after looking all over house and around, one thing was certain Hole had been kidnapped by someone! There was a forest nearby and Atzral entered it to look for Hole, but tragically Atzral died in the process. Atzral was sick, he had cancer and he had a few years left to live, the strong concerns for the disappearance of Hole and the great effort in looking for him in vain helped to speed up the process and at 1 month of the disappearance Atzral died without ever finding Hole. But something happened, Atzral did not go away completely, there was still something of him left in Nefarted, he was his soul, his immortal part, part that did not give up and that is ready to take Hole home and guarantee eternal peace to the deceased Atzral who was physically no longer there.

Now it's your turn to take control of the situation and help Atzral's soul find Hole and bring him home safely ...
